thread.title: Your Celebrations in "God's Own Country" Begins
thread.title_full: Your Celebrations in "God's Own Country" Begins

title: Your Celebrations in "God's Own Country" Begins
text:
Thursday, August 20, 2015 11:52AM IST (6:22AM GMT) Your Celebrations in "God's Own Country" Begins Kochi, Kerala, India 
Your celebrations in God’s own country begins with the perfect time to stir the globetrotter in you. The coastal paradise stretching from Kasargod to Kanyakumari unveils a visual delight, especially in the vibrant Onam. The harvest festival of Kerala welcomes natives and foreigners with a bunch of ethnicity that takes your breath away. Ten days of festivity that portray unity, togetherness and integrity could be very well traced from the enchanting and unique practices including Pookalm (floral carpet), Onasadhya (Onam feast), Snake boat race, Pulikali (tiger play), Thiruvathira and much more. UAE Exchange India, the leading financial and travel service offers special tour packages to explore Kerala in the month of celebrations. Set your journey to feel the purity and sanctity of the distinctive festival with your loved ones. The special festival package “Visit God’s own country and avail exclusive Onam Packages” includes Backwater Cruise Alleppy and Monsoon Special Romantic Kerala for best rates, inclusive of transportation and accommodation. Plan your holidays to explore the hidden magnificence of ‘Venice of Kerala’, ‘Queen of Arabia’, backwaters, forts, monuments, scenic beauty, wildlife, landscape and the typical culture and art forms in the festival season.
